Agent 58 also has empty neighboring sites. Since the agent can reproduce with up to 4 partners and both partners meet all criteria, reproduction with both partners is possible and beneficial for genetic diversity and resource sharing. Therefore, Agent 58 should reproduce with both Agent 80 and Agent 81.
